mapper.select:
/* Catalog.getServicePackCatalogList */ SELECT , sc.service_name AS servicePackName, (SELECT cd.value FROM code_detail cd WHERE cd.key = sc.classification AND cd.group_id = 'SERVICE_PACK_CATALOG') AS classificationValue, (SELECT cd.summary FROM code_detail cd WHERE cd.key = sc.classification AND cd.group_id = 'SERVICE_PACK_CATALOG') AS classificationSummary, sc.parameter as parameter FROM servicepack_category sc WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY sc.no DESC
mapper.insert: /* Catalog.insertBuildPackCatalog */ INSERT INTO buildpack_category ( , app_sample_file_name, app_sample_file_path, app_sample_file_size, buildpack_name) VALUES ( #{name}, #{classification}, #{summary}, #{description}, #{thumbImgName}, #{thumbImgPath}, #{useYn}, #{userId}, now(), now(), #{appSampleFileName}, #{appSampleFilePath}, #{appSampleFileSize}, #{buildPackName});

/* Catalog.insertServicePackCatalog */ INSERT INTO servicepack_category ( , service_name, parameter) VALUES ( #{name}, #{classification}, #{summary}, #{description}, #{thumbImgName}, #{thumbImgPath}, #{useYn}, #{userId}, now(), now(), #{servicePackName}, #{parameter} );
mapper.update:
/* Catalog.updateBuildPackCatalog */ UPDATE buildpack_category SET

mapper.select:
/* Catalog.getStarterNamesList */ SELECT sc.no AS "no", sc.name AS "name", sc.summary AS summary, sc.classification AS classification, sc.use_yn AS useYn, sc.description AS description, sc.thumb_img_name AS thumbImgName, sc.thumb_img_path AS thumbImgPath, (SELECT cd.value FROM code_detail cd WHERE cd.key = sc.classification AND cd.group_id = 'STARTER_CATALOG') AS classificationValue, (SELECT cd.summary FROM code_detail cd WHERE cd.key = sc.classification AND cd.group_id = 'STARTER_CATALOG') AS classificationSummary FROM starter_category sc WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY sc.no DESC
/* Catalog.getBuildPackNamesList */ SELECT bc.no, bc.name FROM buildpack_category bc
/* Catalog.getServicePackNamesList */ SELECT sc.no, sc.name FROM servicepack_category sc

/* Catalog.getOneStarterCatalog */ SELECT , (SELECT sbr.buildpack_category_no FROM starter_buildpack_relation sbr WHERE sbr.starter_category_no = #{no}) AS buildPackCategoryNo, sc.no AS starterCategoryNo FROM starter_category sc WHERE sc.no = #{no}
/* Catalog.getStarterCatalogMaxNumber */ SELECT MAX(sc.no) FROM starter_category sc
mapper.insert: /* Catalog.insertStarterCatalog */ WITH ins1 AS ( INSERT INTO starter_category ( NAME, CLASSIFICATION, SUMMARY, DESCRIPTION, THUMB_IMG_NAME, THUMB_IMG_PATH, USE_YN, USER_ID, created, lastModified ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{classification}, #{summary}, #{description}, #{thumbImgName}, #{thumbImgPath}, #{useYn}, #{userId}, now(), now()) RETURNING no ) INSERT INTO STARTER_BUILDPACK_RELATION (starter_category_no, buildpack_category_no) VALUES ((SELECT no FROM ins1), #{buildPackCategoryNo});
mapper.update:
/* Catalog.updateStarterCatalog */ WITH ins1 AS ( UPDATE starter_category SET
NAME = #{param.name},
classification = #{param.classification},
summary = #{param.summary},
description = #{param.description},
thumb_img_name = #{param.thumbImgName},
thumb_img_path = #{param.thumbImgPath},
use_yn = #{param.useYn},
user_id = #{param.userId},
lastModified = now() WHERE
starter_category.NO = #{param.no} RETURNING starter_category.no
) UPDATE STARTER_BUILDPACK_RELATION SET starter_category_no = (select `no` FROM ins1),
buildpack_category_no = #{param.buildPackCategoryNo}
WHERE starter_category_no = (SELECT `no` FROM ins1);
mapper.insert: /* Catalog.insertCatalogHistory */ INSERT INTO catalog_history ( catalog_no, catalog_type, user_id, created, lastModified) VALUES ( #{catalogNo}, #{catalogType}, #{userId}, now(), now());
